review: Almost constant buffering. It's comparable to chromecast. Doesn't work as good as a play station or Xbox one to stream movies. I don't think it worth much more than the $20 I paid. I wouldn't buy another one.

review: First let me say I have a high speed 3.0 modem, ac router etc.. I also have the roku.. the fire tv stick seems to stutter on most shows to the point that its unwatchable! when I switch over to the roku same movie or show, from the same provider, no stutter at all!  tried resetting etc.. nothing.. must be something with the stick when the same show from the same provider ( amazon, Netflix, etc)  on the Roku is perfect?
author: Beth Hall
